patterns: Tell me about the promotion process
responses: Promotions are based on performance reviews, experience, and management recommendations.
The promotion process is discussed during annual appraisals and depends on your role, contribution, and growth potential.
Employees receive benefits like health insurance, paid leave, and performance bonuses.
The company also offers wellness programs, mental health support, and skill development courses.

patterns: Is there a flexible shift option?
When does the morning shift start?
responses: Regular office hours are 9 AM to 6 PM. However, shift timings depend on the project.
Night and rotational shifts are applicable for support and client-facing teams.

patterns: Tell me about the travel policy
How do I book business travel?
What are the travel reimbursement rules?
responses: All official travel must be approved by your reporting manager before booking.
Travel expenses are reimbursed based on company policy after valid receipts are submitted.

patterns: Tell me about expense claim policy
Can I claim food or cab expenses?
responses: You can claim work-related expenses such as travel, meals, or client meetings, provided they are pre-approved.
Expense claims must be submitted within 7 working days of the transaction with proper bills.

patterns: How do I get access to the server room?
My access card is not working
responses: For any access-related issues, please contact the Admin or Security team.
Server room and restricted area access requires approval from your manager and admin clearance.

patterns: Tell me about health insurance policy
responses: Yes, the company provides group health insurance for employees and their dependents.
Insurance claims can be made through the TPA. Details are available on the HR portal under 'Insurance Benefits'.

patterns: Tell me about the resignation policy
Where do I submit my resignation?
responses: You can submit your resignation through the HR portal under 'Exit Process'.
The standard notice period is 30 days unless specified otherwise in your contract.

patterns: Do we get a joining bonus?
Tell me about joining bonus policy
responses: Joining bonuses are applicable for certain roles based on the offer letter terms.
If applicable, your joining bonus will be credited with your first or second salary cycle.
The standard probation period is 3 months from the date of joining.
After successful completion, your status changes to a confirmed employee.

patterns: Can I apply for internal openings?
What is the internal job posting policy?
How do I apply for another role?
responses: Internal job postings are shared via the HR portal. You can apply through the 'Career Opportunities' section.
Employees are encouraged to explore internal roles after completing 6 months in their current position.

patterns: When will I get my employee ID?
How is the employee ID created?
Can I change my employee ID?
responses: Employee IDs are auto-generated during onboarding and shared in the welcome email.
Employee IDs cannot be changed once created.

patterns: Do we get a performance bonus?
responses: Performance bonuses are based on individual performance and company profitability.
They are usually credited along with the annual appraisal payout.

patterns: How many leaves can I take?
How do I apply for leave?
responses: Employees are entitled to 20 paid leaves per year, including casual and earned leaves. You can apply through the HR portal.
You can apply for leave via the company’s HR system under the 'Leave Management' section.

patterns: What time should I report to work?
responses: Office hours are from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday through Friday.
Working hours are 9 AM to 6 PM with a lunch break from 1 PM to 2 PM.

patterns: Tell me about the work from home policy
responses: Work-from-home is allowed with prior manager approval, depending on the project requirements.
Remote work options are available for certain departments or special cases. Please contact HR for details.

patterns: Tell me about the salary cycle
responses: Salary is credited to employees’ accounts on the last working day of every month.
You can check your payslips and payroll details in the HR portal under 'Payroll'.
Attendance is automatically recorded through the biometric system or remote login tracker.
You can view your attendance records on the HR portal under the 'Attendance' tab.
You can view the official holiday list for this year on the HR portal under 'Holidays 2025'.
The company holiday calendar is available on the internal HR dashboard.
Please raise a support ticket via the IT Helpdesk on the intranet.
For password resets or login issues, contact the IT support team at it.support@company.com.

patterns: Where can I find company policies?
How to access the employee handbook?
responses: Company policies are available on the intranet under 'HR Documents'.
The employee handbook can be downloaded from the internal HR portal under the 'Resources' section.

patterns: Are there any skill development programs?
responses: You can register for upcoming training sessions through the 'Learning & Development' section on the portal.
Monthly training and certification programs are shared via HR communication emails.
Reimbursement claims can be submitted through the Finance portal with valid bills attached.
All reimbursements must be approved by your reporting manager before submission.

patterns: What documents do I need for onboarding?
responses: On your joining day, HR will guide you through document verification and orientation.
Please bring your ID proof, address proof, academic certificates, and previous employment documents.
Performance appraisals are conducted annually based on your performance metrics and manager feedback.
Appraisals are usually held at the end of the fiscal year, followed by salary revisions where applicable.

patterns: I need to talk to HR
responses: You can reach the HR team via hr@company.com or visit the HR department during working hours.
HR contact details are available in the company directory on the intranet.

patterns: Who do I contact for project details?
responses: Project assignments are managed by your reporting manager or the PMO team.
For support, contact your team lead or raise a ticket in the internal project management system.
Please restart your router and try again. If the issue persists, raise a ticket with IT support.
The IT department can assist you with connectivity problems at it.support@company.com.

patterns: How to get employee ID card?
How can I replace my ID badge?
responses: If you’ve lost your ID card, please inform HR immediately and request a replacement through the internal form.
New employees receive their ID cards during onboarding within the first week of joining.

patterns: What food options are available in cafeteria?
responses: The cafeteria is open from 8:00 AM to 7:00 PM offering breakfast, lunch, and snacks.
You can find the cafeteria menu on the intranet under the 'Facilities' section.

patterns: Tell me about the payroll system
responses: Payroll is the process of calculating and distributing employee salaries, bonuses, and deductions each month.
The payroll system ensures timely salary disbursement, tax deductions, and generation of payslips through the HR portal.
You can check your payroll details and payslips under the 'Payroll' tab on the HR system.
